text: Matheus J. "Thé" Lau (17 July 1952 – 23 June 2015) was a Dutch musician and writer. Besides his solo career, he was the lead singer of the Dutch band The Scene. He was born in Bergen, North Holland. Lau was diagnosed with lung cancer in August 2013. He was told he could not be cured in April 2014. He died on 23 June 2015 in Amsterdam, aged 62.Zanger Thé Lau (62) overleden - Volkskrant ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Dutch musicians Category:Writers from North Holland
title: Thé Lau
